cards.name: Acquire
cards.text: Search target opponent's library for an artifact card and put that card onto the battlefield under your control. Then that player shuffles his or her library.
cards.flavor: "Ownership' is such a fray area."

cards.name: Ajani Steadfast
cards.text:
+1: Until end of turn, up to one target creature gets +1/+1 and gains first strike, vigilance, and lifelink.
−2: Put a +1/+1 counter on each creature you control and a loyalty counter on each other planeswalker you control.
−7: You get an emblem with "If a source would deal damage to you or a planeswalker you control, prevent all but 1 of that damage."

cards.name: Ajani, Caller of the Pride
cards.text:
+1: Put a +1/+1 counter on up to one target creature.
−3: Target creature gains flying and double strike until end of turn.
−8: Put X 2/2 white Cat creature tokens onto the battlefield, where X is your life total.

cards.name: Angel of Glory's Rise
cards.text:
Flying
When Angel of Glory's Rise enters the battlefield, exile all Zombies, then return all Human creature cards from your graveyard to the battlefield.
cards.flavor: "Justice isn't done until undeath is undone."

cards.name: Angelic Skirmisher
cards.text:
Flying
At the beginning of each combat, choose first strike, vigilance, or lifelink. Creatures you control gain that ability until end of turn.
cards.flavor: "A keen mind wields an army as a deft hand wields a sword."

cards.name: Ankle Shanker
cards.text:
Haste
Whenever Ankle Shanker attacks, creatures you control gain first strike and deathtouch until end of turn.
cards.flavor: The stature of the fighter matters less than the depth of the cut.

cards.name: Arena
cards.text: {3}, {T}: Tap target creature you control and target creature of an opponent's choice he or she controls. Those creatures fight each other. (Each deals damage equal to its power to the other.)

cards.name: Arrest
cards.text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature can't attack or block, and its activated abilities can't be activated.
cards.flavor: Fayden didn't know if the giant had created the spehere's magic—only that he had to escape it to find Sifa.

cards.name: Avalanche Tusker
cards.text: Whenever Avalanche Tusker attacks, target creature defending player controls blocks it this combat if able.
cards.flavor:
"Hold the high ground, then bring it to your enemy"
—Surrak, khan of the Temur

cards.name: Birds of Paradise
cards.text:
Flying
{T}: Add one mana of any color to your mana pool.
cards.flavor:
"The gods used their feathers to paint all the colors of the world."
—Yare-Tiva, warden of Gramur forest

cards.name: Bloodthrone Vampire
cards.text: Sacrifice a creature: Bloodthrone Vampire gets +2/+2 until end of turn.
cards.flavor: www.MagicTheGathering.com

cards.name: Blue Elemental Blast
cards.text:
Choose one —
• Counter target red spell.
• Destroy target red permanent.

cards.name: Bonescythe Sliver
cards.text: Sliver creatures you control have double strike. (They deal both first-strike and regular combat damage.)
cards.flavor:
"Their appendages are sharper than our swords and quicker than our bows."
—Hastric, Thunian scout

cards.name: Breath of Malfegor
cards.text: Breath of Malfegor deals 5 damage to each opponent.
cards.flavor: The draconic demon loomed over Dack, and he suddenly sensed he wasn't the only Planeswalker that Malfegor had encountered.

cards.name: Brion Stoutarm
cards.text:
Lifelink
{R}, {T}, Sacrifice a creature other than Brion Stoutarm: Brion Stoutarm deals damage equal to the sacrificed creature's power to target player.

cards.name: Broodmate Dragon
cards.text:
Flying
When Broodmate Dragon enters the battlefield, put a 4/4 red Dragon creature token with flying onto the battlefield.
cards.flavor: Frozen in fear, the goblins stared upward at the circling hunter—and were promptly eaten by its diving mate.

cards.name: Cathedral of War
cards.text:
Cathedral of War enters the battlefield tapped.
Exalted (Whenever a creature you control attacks alone, that creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn.)
{T}: Add {1} to your mana pool.

cards.name: Celestial Colonnade
cards.text:
Celestial Colonnade enters the battlefield tapped.
{T}: Add {W} or {U} to your mana pool.
{3}{W}{U}: Until end of turn, Celestial Colonnade becomes a 4/4 white and blue Elemental creature with flying and vigilance. It's still a land.

cards.name: Chandra's Fury
cards.text: Chandra's Fury deals 4 damage to target player and 1 damage to each creature that player controls.
cards.flavor: www.MagicTheGathering.com

cards.name: Chandra's Phoenix
cards.text:
Flying
Haste (This creature can attack and {T} as soon as it comes under your control.)
Whenever an opponent is dealt damage by a red instant or sorcery spell you control or by a red planeswalker you control, return Chandra's Phoenix from your graveyard to your hand.

cards.name: Chandra, Pyromaster
cards.text:
+1: Chandra, Pyromaster deals 1 damage to target player and 1 damage to up to one target creature that player controls. That creature can't block this turn.
0: Exile the top card of your library. You may play it this turn.
−7: Exile the top ten cards of your library. Choose an instant or sorcery card exiled this way and copy it three times. You may cast the copies without paying their mana costs.

cards.name: Chandra, Pyromaster
cards.text:
+1: Chandra, Pyromaster deals 1 damage to target player and 1 damage to up to one target creature that player controls. That creature can't block this turn.
0: Exile the top card of your library. You may play it this turn.
−7: Exile the top ten cards of your library. Choose an instant or sorcery card exiled this way and copy it three times. You may cast the copies without paying their mana costs.

cards.name: Consume Spirit
cards.text:
Spend only black mana on X.
Consume Spirit deals X damage to target creature or player and you gain X life.
cards.flavor:
"You clerics brag about your strength of spirit, yet I take away the tiniest fragment, and you crumple like a rag doll."
—Sorin Markov

cards.name: Corrupt
cards.text: Corrupt deals damage equal to the number of Swamps you control to target creature or player. You gain life equal to the damage dealt this way.

cards.name: Day of Judgment
cards.text: Destroy all creatures.
cards.flavor:
"I have seen planes leveled and all life rendered to dust. It brought no pleasure, even to a heart as dark as mine."
—Sorin Markov

cards.name: Devil's Play
cards.text:
Devil's Play deals X damage to target creature or player.
Flashback {X}{R}{R}{R} (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)
cards.flavor: A devil's hands are never idle.

cards.name: Dreg Mangler
cards.text:
Haste
Scavenge {3}{B}{G} ({3}{B}{G}, Exile this card from your graveyard: Put a number of +1/+1 counters equal to this card's power on target creature. Scavenge only as a sorcery.)

cards.name: Duress
cards.text: Target opponent reveals his or her hand. You choose a noncreature, nonland card from it. That player discards that card.
cards.flavor: "Your night names inspire me, Dack!"

cards.name: Eidolon of Blossoms
cards.text: Constellation — Whenever Eidolon of Blossoms or another enchantment enters the battlefield under your control, draw a card.
cards.flavor: The emotional echoes of dryad gatherings attract lost souls.

cards.name: Electrolyze
cards.text:
Electrolyze deals 2 damage divided as you choose among one or two target creatures and/or players.
Draw a card.

cards.name: Faithless Looting
cards.text:
Draw two cards, then discard two cards.
Flashback {2}{R} (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)
cards.flavor: "Avacyn has abandoned us! We have nothing left except what we can take!"

cards.name: Fated Conflagration
cards.text: Fated Conflagration deals 5 damage to target creature or planeswalker. If it's your turn, scry 2. (Look at the top two cards of your library, then put any number of them on the bottom of your library and the rest on top in any order.)

cards.name: Feast of Blood
cards.text:
Cast Feast of Blood only if you control two or more Vampires.
Destroy target creature. You gain 4 life.
cards.flavor: Imbued in the Ancient Fang were spells far darker than any Dack Fayden would cast.

cards.name: Fireball
cards.text:
Fireball deals X damage divided evenly, rounded down, among any number of target creatures and/or players.
Fireball costs {1} more to cast for each target beyond the first.

cards.name: Frost Titan
cards.text:
Whenever Frost Titan becomes the target of a spell or ability an opponent controls, counter that spell or ability unless its controller pays {2}.
Whenever Frost Titan enters the battlefield or attacks, tap target permanent. It doesn't untap during its controller's next untap step.

cards.name: Garruk Wildspeaker
cards.text:
+1: Untap two target lands.
−1: Put a 3/3 green Beast creature token onto the battlefield.
−4: Creatures you control get +3/+3 and gain trample until end of turn.

cards.name: Garruk, Apex Predator
cards.text:
+1: Destroy another target planeswalker.
+1: Put a 3/3 black Beast creature token with deathtouch onto the battlefield.
−3: Destroy target creature. You gain life equal to its toughness.
−8: Target opponent gets an emblem with "Whenever a creature attacks you, it gets +5/+5 and gains trample until end of turn."

cards.name: Garruk, Caller of Beasts
cards.text:
+1: Reveal the top five cards of your library. Put all creature cards revealed this way into your hand and the rest on the bottom of your library in any order.
−3: You may put a green creature card from your hand onto the battlefield.
−7: You get an emblem with "Whenever you cast a creature spell, you may search your library for a creature card, put it onto the battlefield, then shuffle your library."

cards.name: Gaze of Granite
cards.text: Destroy each nonland permanent with converted mana cost X or less.
cards.flavor: "Show yourself, thief."

cards.name: Giant Badger
cards.text: Whenever Giant Badger blocks, it gets +2/+2 until end of turn.
cards.flavor: The wizard Greensleeves called a Giant Badger to her aid in an battle with the desert mage Karli.

cards.name: Goblin Rabblemaster
cards.text:
Other Goblin creatures you control attack each turn if able.
At the beginning of combat on your turn, put a 1/1 red Goblin creature token with haste onto the battlefield.
Whenever Goblin Rabblemaster attacks, it gets +1/+0 until end of turn for each other attacking Goblin.

cards.name: Grave Titan
cards.text:
Deathtouch
Whenever Grave Titan enters the battlefield or attacks, put two 2/2 black Zombie creature tokens onto the battlefield.
cards.flavor: Death in form and function.

cards.name: Gravecrawler
cards.text:
Gravecrawler can't block.
You may cast Gravecrawler from your graveyard as long as you control a Zombie.
cards.flavor:
"Innistrad's ghoulcallers are talented enough, but let me show you what someone with real power can create."
—Liliana Vess

cards.name: Guul Draz Assassin
cards.text:
Level up {1}{B} ({1}{B}: Put a level counter on this. Level up only as a sorcery.)
LEVEL 2-3
2/2
{B}, {T}: Target creature gets -2/-2 until end of turn.
LEVEL 4+
4/4
{B}, {T}: Target creature gets -4/-4 until end of turn.

cards.name: Hamletback Goliath
cards.text: Whenever another creature enters the battlefield, you may put X +1/+1 counters on Hamletback Goliath, where X is that creature's power.
cards.flavor:
"If you live on a giant's back, there's only one individual you'll ever need to fear."
—Gaddock Teeg

cards.name: High Tide
cards.text: Until end of turn, whenever a player taps an Island for mana, that player adds {U} to his or her mana pool (in addition to the mana the land produces).
cards.flavor: "There's nothing like the high seas to clear your head or escape pursuers."

cards.name: Honor of the Pure
cards.text: White creatures you control get +1/+1.
cards.flavor: Together the soldiers were like a golden blade, cutting down their enemies and scarring the darkness.

cards.name: Inferno Titan
cards.text:
{R}: Inferno Titan gets +1/+0 until end of turn.
Whenever Inferno Titan enters the battlefield or attacks, it deals 3 damage divided as you choose among one, two, or three target creatures and/or players.

cards.name: Ivorytusk Fortress
cards.text: Untap each creature you control with a +1/+1 counter on it during each other player's untap step.
cards.flavor: Abzan soldiers march to war confident that their Houses march with them.

cards.name: Jace Beleren
cards.text:
+2: Each player draws a card.
−1: Target player draws a card.
−10: Target player puts the top twenty cards of his or her library into his or her graveyard.

cards.name: Jace, Memory Adept
cards.text:
+1: Draw a card. Target player puts the top card of his or her library into his or her graveyard.
0: Target player puts the top ten cards of his or her library into his or her graveyard.
−7: Any number of target players each draw twenty cards.

cards.name: Jace, the Living Guildpact
cards.text:
+1: Look at the top two cards of your library. Put one of them into your graveyard.
−3: Return another target nonland permanent to its owner's hand.
−8: Each player shuffles his or her hand and graveyard into his or her library. You draw seven cards.

cards.name: Jaya Ballard, Task Mage
cards.text:
{R}, {T}, Discard a card: Destroy target blue permanent.
{1}{R}, {T}, Discard a card: Jaya Ballard, Task Mage deals 3 damage to target creature or player. A creature dealt damage this way can't be regenerated this turn.
{5}{R}{R}, {T}, Discard a card: Jaya Ballard deals 6 damage to each creature and each player.

cards.name: Karametra's Acolyte
cards.text: {T}: Add an amount of {G} to your mana pool equal to your devotion to green. (Each {G} in the mana costs of permanents you control counts toward your devotion to green.)
cards.flavor: "The wilds are a garden tended by divine hands."

cards.name: Knight Exemplar
cards.text:
First strike (This creature deals combat damage before creatures without first strike.)
Other Knight creatures you control get +1/+1 and have indestructible. (Damage and effects that say "destroy" don't destroy them.)
cards.flavor: "If you think you are brave enough to walk the path of honor, follow me into the dragon's den."

cards.name: Kor Skyfisher
cards.text:
Flying
When Kor Skyfisher enters the battlefield, return a permanent you control to its owner's hand.
cards.flavor: www.MagicTheGathering.com

cards.name: Lightning Hounds
cards.text: First strike
cards.flavor: Quick enough to avoid jhovalls when alone and fierce enough to attack them in packs, the hounds were as at home in the mountains as the Mercadians were atop theirs.

cards.name: Liliana of the Dark Realms
cards.text:
+1: Search your library for a Swamp card, reveal it, and put it into your hand. Then shuffle your library.
−3: Target creature gets +X/+X or -X/-X until end of turn, where X is the number of Swamps you control.
−6: You get an emblem with "Swamps you control have ‘{T}: Add {B}{B}{B}{B} to your mana pool.'"

cards.name: Liliana Vess
cards.text:
+1: Target player discards a card.
−2: Search your library for a card, then shuffle your library and put that card on top of it.
−8: Put all creature cards from all graveyards onto the battlefield under your control.

cards.name: Liliana Vess
cards.text:
+1: Target player discards a card.
−2: Search your library for a card, then shuffle your library and put that card on top of it.
−8: Put all creature cards from all graveyards onto the battlefield under your control.

cards.name: Magister of Worth
cards.text:
Flying
Will of the council — When Magister of Worth enters the battlefield, starting with you, each player votes for grace or condemnation. If grace gets more votes, each player returns each creature card from his or her graveyard to the battlefield. If condemnation gets more votes or the vote is tied, destroy all creatures other than Magister of Worth.

cards.name: Mana Crypt
cards.text:
At the beginning of your upkeep, flip a coin. If you lose the flip, Mana Crypt deals 3 damage to you.
{T}: Add {2} to your mana pool.

cards.name: Memoricide
cards.text: Name a nonland card. Search target player's graveyard, hand, and library for any number of cards with that name and exile them. Then that player shuffles his or her library.
cards.flavor: "You claim wisdom, yet I see nothing in here but tawdry wishes."

cards.name: Merfolk Mesmerist
cards.text: {U}, {T}: Target player puts the top two cards of his or her library into his or her graveyard.
cards.flavor: www.MagicTheGathering.com

cards.name: Mirran Crusader
cards.text: Double strike, protection from black and from green
cards.flavor: A symbol of what Mirrodin once was and hope for what it will be again.

cards.name: Nalathni Dragon
cards.text:
Flying; banding (Any creatures with banding, and up to one without, can attack in a band. Bands are blocked as a group. If any creatures with banding you control are blocking or being blocked by a creature, you divide that creature's combat damage, not its controller, among any of the creatures it's being blocked by or is blocking.)
{R}: Nalathni Dragon gets +1/+0 until end of turn. If this ability has been activated four or more times this turn, sacrifice Nalathni Dragon at the beginning of the next end step.
cards.flavor:
These small but intelligent Dragons and their Olesian allies held back the tide of Pashalik Mons's hordes of Goblin Raiders.
DragonCon 1994

cards.name: Nightveil Specter
cards.text:
Flying
Whenever Nightveil Specter deals combat damage to a player, that player exiles the top card of his or her library.
You may play cards exiled with Nightveil Specter.

cards.name: Nissa Revane
cards.text:
+1: Search your library for a card named Nissa's Chosen and put it onto the battlefield. Then shuffle your library.
+1: You gain 2 life for each Elf you control.
−7: Search your library for any number of Elf creature cards and put them onto the battlefield. Then shuffle your library.

cards.name: Nissa, Worldwaker
cards.text:
+1: Target land you control becomes a 4/4 Elemental creature with trample. It's still a land.
+1: Untap up to four target Forests.
−7: Search your library for any number of basic land cards, put them onto the battlefield, then shuffle your library. Those lands become 4/4 Elemental creatures with trample. They're still lands.

cards.name: Ogre Arsonist
cards.text: When Ogre Arsonist enters the battlefield, destroy target land.
cards.flavor:
"All of Ravnica's looking for you, Dack, from the Wojek on down."
—Maytov

cards.name: Ogre Battledriver
cards.text: Whenever another creature enters the battlefield under your control, that creature gets +2/+0 and gains haste until end of turn. (It can attack and {T} this turn.)
cards.flavor: Ogres are driven by passion, rage, and another ogre standing behind them with a whip.

cards.name: Phyrexian Rager
cards.text: When Phyrexian Rager enters the battlefield, you draw a card and you lose 1 life.
cards.flavor: It takes no prisoners, but it keeps the choicest bits for Phyrexia.

cards.name: Primordial Hydra
cards.text:
Primordial Hydra enters the battlefield with X +1/+1 counters on it.
At the beginning of your upkeep, double the number of +1/+1 counters on Primordial Hydra.
Primordial Hydra has trample as long as it has ten or more +1/+1 counters on it.

cards.name: Rakshasa Vizier
cards.text: Whenever one or more cards are put into exile from your graveyard, put that many +1/+1 counters on Rakshasa Vizier.
cards.flavor: Rakshasa offer deals that sound advantageous to those who forget who they are dealing with.

cards.name: Ratchet Bomb
cards.text:
{T}: Put a charge counter on Ratchet Bomb.
{T}, Sacrifice Ratchet Bomb: Destroy each nonland permanent with converted mana cost equal to the number of charge counters on Ratchet Bomb.

cards.name: Rattleclaw Mystic
cards.text:
{T}: Add {G}, {U}, or {R} to your mana pool.
Morph {2} (You may cast this card face down as a 2/2 creature for {3}. Turn it face up any time for its morph cost.)
When Rattleclaw Mystic is turned face up, add {G}{U}{R} to your mana pool.

cards.name: Render Silent
cards.text: Counter target spell. Its controller can't cast spells this turn.
cards.flavor: "We have confiscated your spells as evidence. Once we conclude our investigation, you may petition to have them returned."

cards.name: Retaliator Griffin
cards.text:
Flying
Whenever a source an opponent controls deals damage to you, you may put that many +1/+1 counters on Retaliator Griffin.
cards.flavor: For every eye, an eye. For every tooth, a tooth. Griffins are nothing if not fair.

cards.name: Sage of the Inward Eye
cards.text:
Flying
Whenever you cast a noncreature spell, creatures you control gain lifelink until end of turn.
cards.flavor: "No one petal claims beauty for the lotus."

cards.name: Scavenging Ooze
cards.text: {G}: Exile target card from a graveyard. If it was a creature card, put a +1/+1 counter on Scavenging Ooze and you gain 1 life.
cards.flavor: In nature, not a single bone or scrap of flesh goes to waste.

cards.name: Scent of Cinder
cards.text: Reveal any number of red cards in your hand. Scent of Cinder deals X damage to target creature or player, where X is the number of cards revealed this way.

cards.name: Serra Avatar
cards.text:
Serra Avatar's power and toughness are each equal to your life total.
When Serra Avatar is put into a graveyard from anywhere, shuffle it into its owner's library.

cards.name: Sewers of Estark
cards.text: Choose target creature. If it's attacking, it can't be blocked this turn. If it's blocking, prevent all combat damage that would be dealt this combat by it and each creature it's blocking.

cards.name: Silver Drake
cards.text:
Flying
When Silver Drake enters the battlefield, return a white or blue creature you control to its owner's hand.

cards.name: Silverblade Paladin
cards.text:
Soulbond (You may pair this creature with another unpaired creature when either enters the battlefield. They remain paired for as long as you control both of them.)
As long as Silverblade Paladin is paired with another creature, both creatures have double strike.

cards.name: Soul of Ravnica
cards.text:
Flying
{5}{U}{U}: Draw a card for each color among permanents you control.
{5}{U}{U}, Exile Soul of Ravnica from your graveyard: Draw a card for each color among permanents you control.

cards.name: Soul of Zendikar
cards.text:
Reach
{3}{G}{G}: Put a 3/3 green Beast creature token onto the battlefield.
{3}{G}{G}, Exile Soul of Zendikar from your graveyard: Put a 3/3 green Beast creature token onto the battlefield.

cards.name: Spined Wurm
cards.flavor:
"As it moved, the wurm's spines gathered up bits of flowstone, which took the shapes of dead villagers' heads. Each head spoke a single sound, but if taken together, they said, 'Alas for the living.'"
—Dal myth of the wurm

cards.name: Standstill
cards.text: When a player casts a spell, sacrifice Standstill. If you do, each of that player's opponents draws three cards.
cards.flavor:
"You learn a lot in no time when you're about to get your neck snapped."
—Dack Fayden

cards.name: Stealer of Secrets
cards.text: Whenever Stealer of Secrets deals combat damage to a player, draw a card.
cards.flavor: www.MagicTheGathering.com

cards.name: Steward of Valeron
cards.text:
Vigilance
{T}: Add {G} to your mana pool.
cards.flavor: www.MagicTheGathering.com

cards.name: Sunblast Angel
cards.text:
Flying
When Sunblast Angel enters the battlefield, destroy all tapped creatures.
cards.flavor: There may exist powers even greater than Phyrexia.

cards.name: Supreme Verdict
cards.text:
Supreme Verdict can't be countered.
Destroy all creatures.
cards.flavor: Leonos had no second thoughts about the abolishment edict. He'd left skyrunes warning of the eviction, even though it was cloudy.

cards.name: Surgical Extraction
cards.text:
({B/P} can be paid with either {B} or 2 life.)
Choose target card in a graveyard other than a basic land card. Search its owner's graveyard, hand, and library for any number of cards with the same name as that card and exile them. Then that player shuffles his or her library.

cards.name: Sylvan Caryatid
cards.text:
Defender, hexproof
{T}: Add one mana of any color to your mana pool.
cards.flavor: Those who enter the copse never leave. They find peace there and take root, becoming part of the ever-growing grove.

cards.name: Terastodon
cards.text: When Terastodon enters the battlefield, you may destroy up to three target noncreature permanents. For each permanent put into a graveyard this way, its controller puts a 3/3 green Elephant creature token onto the battlefield.

cards.name: Treasure Hunt
cards.text: Reveal cards from the top of your library until you reveal a nonland card, then put all cards revealed this way into your hand.
cards.flavor:
"Some call me a thief. I prefer to think of myself as a discreet borrower."
—Dack Fayden, Planeswalker

cards.name: Turnabout
cards.text: Choose artifact, creature, or land. Tap all untapped permanents of the chosen type target player controls, or untap all tapped permanents of that type that player controls.
cards.flavor: The best cure for a big ego is a little failure.

cards.name: Vampire Nocturnus
cards.text:
Play with the top card of your library revealed.
As long as the top card of your library is black, Vampire Nocturnus and other Vampire creatures you control get +2/+1 and have flying.
cards.flavor: "Your life will set with the sun."

cards.name: Voidmage Husher
cards.text:
Flash (You may cast this spell any time you could cast an instant.)
When Voidmage Husher enters the battlefield, counter target activated ability. (Mana abilities can't be targeted.)
Whenever you cast a spell, you may return Voidmage Husher to its owner's hand.

cards.name: Warmonger
cards.text: {2}: Warmonger deals 1 damage to each creature without flying and each player. Any player may activate this ability.
cards.flavor: Funny how money and war travel so well together.

cards.name: Wash Out
cards.text: Return all permanents of the color of your choice to their owners' hands.
cards.flavor:
"Perhaps planning should become a higher priority for me."
—Dack Fayden

cards.name: Windseeker Centaur
cards.text: Vigilance
cards.flavor: Loyal and passionate in battle, the Windseeker tribe roams the Green Lands near the Honeyed Sea.

cards.name: Xathrid Necromancer
cards.text: Whenever Xathrid Necromancer or another Human creature you control dies, put a 2/2 black Zombie creature token onto the battlefield tapped.
cards.flavor: "My commands shall echo forever in their dusty skulls."
